title: My LOVE FOR LUX
body: I hate Lux!!!!! Why do people say that she comes from demasia.Honestly she comes from hell and she came in the game to burn the mid

replies.body:
We have a champion coming out that agrees with you....   

Opps, forget I said that!
I will destroy said champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Final Spark Lux,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yLsnI7Ni,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2017-10-17T07:05:48.737+0000)
>
> I will destroy said champion.

Can Lux forgive and expand her light to all?

She can, but if the new champ tries anything, it's Lights Out for everyone.

https://tmiracle.deviantart.com/art/Elementalist-Lux-Dark-648333039
We getting an uglier shade of demacian idealism??

Weird, cause I thought there was recent talk (not sure if confirmed) that CertainlyT's new champ comes under the mage class, much like Lux. 

On the slim chance that you're right or close to it, that would bring up some big questions. Like why would a fellow (potentially Demacian) mage despise another?
Perhaps they want to be the only Demacian mage

There can be only one.

https://img.ifcdn.com/images/cf078fd270527a925da0d7f3f7db49aa0e7acdda7f4c1c02582028f6d66deb09_1.gif
Maybe. They basically have an entire guild of mages so this new mage would have to be against the whole guild which is possible.

This apparent "Guild of mages" you happen to reference isn't the Illuminators/ Radiant Ones by any chance is it? Because just so it's clear, they're specifically a religious order not a mage guild, yes they're open to privately use mages but there's no indication the order is made up entirely of them. 

However, I guess pettiness could be an interesting dynamic for a fellow Demacian mage.
That would be interesting. Imagine if it was an elemental mage too xD

Jealousy? Lux is gorgeous, she's brilliant, she's bright in more than one way, people like her. 

I hope it is another Demacian Mage.

We talkin' mage as in class, or mage as in lore?

Cuz if it's the former, not everyone in the mage class uses magic. (Teemo's entire arsenal is built around poison, for example)
In the name of Demacia, I will punish you {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Looks like i have a new main then!
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

> [{quoted}](name=Epicurus,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yLsnI7Ni,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-10-17T06:26:59.587+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-janna}}

this is janna not lux
It's Janna...

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yLsnI7Ni,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-18T18:33:57.956+0000)
>
> It's Janna...

I know, that's what i said
I don't think so...

This new champ is fae related... I can feel it, I CAN READ BETWEEN LINES!!

Seriously though if it is - many thanks. I love Lulu (even though I can't play her) and I want the fae to be more prominent in league
OOhshiiiiit
OMFG are we getting a Demacian inquisitor?

he/she hate mages? or lux specifically? are we finally getting that inquisitor type champion from Demacia that wanna burn all the witches and heretics? so many questions!

i smell "hang all the mages before they end us all" here!
you doin alright dude?
r u ok
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m14jfqX3v81r6qlgco1_400.gif
I feel like nami and lux have the same personality{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

A new champ that hates Lux...? Is it Lux, or mage as a whole ? Is it related to gameplay (a counter to immobile mages) or to lore ?
So like mentionned before a champ from Demacia in rivalry with Lux ? Or maybe an ennemy from Noxus ?
They way it said sounds like the new champ might just be an inquisitor type like "BURN ALL THE MAGIC WITCHES !!" (it would be an amazing idea for a champion tbh, goes to show how dark demacia can really be and having a super faithful/strict champ would get a nice twist of change...)
So many questions... But...but...How can anyone hates Lux ??
Give me more hint Rito pls

Lux is relentlessly happy. 

I want her to get hit.

In the face.

With a black hole.
Amen bro!
A...are you having a stroke or something.
